types.section:
{{fr-noun|m}}

# a “[[thesis]] [[novel]]”: a novel that is [[didactic]] rather than [[entertain]]ing, often taking the form of [[social commentary]]
types.html:
roman à thèse m (plural romans à thèse)

  1. a “thesis novel”: a novel that is didactic rather than entertaining, often taking the form of social commentary
trans: a “thesis novel”: a novel that is didactic rather than entertaining, often taking the form of social commentary
